wikipedia_page.main: Peter Carr (born 25 August 1951) is an English retired professional football defender. He spent four seasons in the North American Soccer League, at least one in the Major Indoor Soccer League and two in the American Soccer League.

response: * Peter Carr, D (1981–82) 14 games, 1 goal, 0 assists
